articles.description: Just before dusk on Friday, a white van pulled into Northern Neck Regional Jail, a green-roofed, low-slung building about three miles from the bank of the Rappahannock River in Virginia.

articles.author: BY PATRICK WILSON Richmond Times-Dispatch
articles.title: State jail death investigator closing cases, but information isn't public
articles.description: A new state jail death investigator reviewing cases back to July 1 has closed 17 while 36 remain pending, including the death of an 18-year-old on Tuesday in the Hampton Roads Regional Jail.

articles.description: A Spotsylvania man has been charged with multiple offenses following an incident in the parking lot of a county motel Wednesday in which two people were shot.

articles.description: STAFFORD, Va. (AP) — A South Carolina man faces a slew of charges after he shot at Virginia troopers following a high-speed chase on a major highway, authorities said Tuesday.

articles.title: King George man accused of picking up and raping a teenage girl
articles.description: A 56-year-old King George County man is accused of picking up a 14-year-old girl from her home Wednesday and sexually molesting her, police said.

articles.description: A mother and daughter are accusing of stealing more than $300,000 from a Fredericksburg company that they were working for as accountants, court records show.

articles.title: Former Blackwater guard goes on trial for second time for role in mass shooting in Iraq
articles.description: Former Blackwater guard Nick Slatten goes on trial for the second time for his role in a mass shooting that killed 14 civilians during the Iraq War in 2007. His conviction for first-degree murder was thrown out last August.

articles.title: Army widow in Virginia battles Department of Veterans Affairs over pair of costly mistakes
articles.description: The first time Amy Siegel visited the Department of Veterans Affairs to apply for survivor benefits, her husband had been dead for less than five weeks and she was four months pregnant.
